location_working: SPA treatments Monday-Sunday from 9.00 a.m. to 9 p.m.

location_description: Indoor swimming pool, 6 types of baths and saunas, contrast Japanese Ofuro, Kneipp path, Sensations Shower, Infinity Pool on the roof, beauty and health treatments, group lessons and personal training.
